CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silver Screen Sanctuary relative to Azure Vista Cinema?
SRP.A: Silver Screen Sanctuary is {above} Azure Vista Cinema in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Grand Celestial}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cinema attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Meridian Picture House}.

VE.Q: What is Azure Vista Cinema's Cinema Attendance in 1998?
VE.A: Azure Vista Cinema's cinema attendance in 1998 is {3306479.95} tickets.

VE.Q: What is The Grand Celestial's Cinema Attendance in 2001?
VE.A: The Grand Celestial's cinema attendance in 2001 is {5716288.66} tickets.

VE.Q: What is Azure Vista Cinema's Cinema Attendance in 2001?
VE.A: Azure Vista Cinema's cinema attendance in 2001 is {3813916.08} tickets.

VE.Q: What are the cinema attendance of The Grand Celestial, Azure Vista Cinema, and Meridian Picture House in 1993?
VE.A: The Grand Celestial's cinema attendance is {2643517.79} tickets, Azure Vista Cinema's cinema attendance is {2600285.69} tickets, Meridian Picture House's cinema attendance is {2314033.02} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cinema Attendance in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cinema attendance is {1885919.27} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cinema Attendance in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cinema attendance is {11128378.81} tickets.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cinema Attendance level recorded for Azure Vista Cinema?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema reached approximately {4861655.13} tickets in {2008}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cinema Attendance level recorded for Azure Vista Cinema?
EVJ.A: Azure Vista Cinema's lowest recorded level is approximately {2011725.83} tickets in {1991}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cinema Attendance?
SC.A: The average total cinema attendance is {15093381.69} tickets.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cinema Attendance exceed 17904208.69 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cinema Attendance go below 11510677.95 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cinema Attendance fall between 13972071.15 and 15442815.49 tickets? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1992, was the average total Cinema Attendance higher or lower than between 1996 and 1997?
NC.A: The average total cinema attendance between 1991 and 1992 was {lower} than between 1996 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1998, did the total Cinema Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total cinema attendance between 1996 and 1998 was {smaller} than between 1991 and 2004.

NC.Q: Was the total Cinema Attendance in 1998 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total cinema attendance in 1998 was {lower} than in 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 2006, did the total Cinema Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total cinema attendance between 1991 and 2006 was {larger} than between 1995 and 2001.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {The Grand Celestial} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Meridian Picture House, Silver Screen Sanctuary, Azure Vista Cinema, The Grand Celestial}.
